      public int removeFromOrder(int tableId, int itemId, int quantity)
      remove Item/Promotion objects from the order of table tableId
      Parameters:
      tableId - the tableId that has the order need to process
      itemId - id of the Item/Promotion to be removed
      quantity - number of Promotion object to remove
      Returns:
      2 if they are removed normally
